title: Image Super-Resolution Restoration: Multimodal Deep Learning Design and Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Python programming, foundational deep learning, and image processing theory
context.additional_context: Course focused on acquiring image restoration skills for solving real-world social issues

learning_goals: Design and implement a super-resolution reconstruction neural network structure utilizing multimodal data (near-infrared, RGB, etc.)
Explain methods for applying sparse coding and iterative algorithm principles to deep learning architectures
Submit project-based assessment outcomes applying super-resolution technology to real-world domain problems (medical, environmental monitoring, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
